entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 10:14 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 5:06 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:06 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
